descriptionHtml:
I was bored, and wanted to see if I could make a mod. This is my first mod, and I think it turned out pretty well. So long, immersion.

I have no idea how to add new eyes to the game, so they are just retextures of the regular eyes. They should work with all of the races eyes, probably. You just have to rename them to the right name.

=-=-=-=-= Installation =-=-=-=-=
There are a couple different ways to install this mod. You can:

a). Use the NMM compatible version. This adds most (9/12) of the eyes that I mad to the game. A fair warning, since the eyes are retextures and not new eyes, using this will give most, if not all, of the human characters (npc\'s + your character) the eyes. The three eyes that aren\'t installed via this method are the byakugan, sasuke\'s rinnegan, and shisui\'s mangekyo. If you want any of those instead of the other, change its name to the same as the file you don\'t want, and swap them out. (list of which eye has which file name is included) 

b). If you only want your character to have the eyes, then download the non NMM compatible file. Move the eye file you want to data -> textures -> actors -> character -> eyes.
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

To do list.
Make the rinnegan a darker purple: Done
Add Kakashi\'s eye: Done
Make the sharingan eyes darker: working on it.
Add a NMM compatible verison: Done
Add compatibility for non-human races: working on it.
Make Byakugan darker: Done, need to upload it.
author: ReisGuard
